Design and launch landing pages faster.

Trusted by thousands of companies worldwide

Integrations

Integrate with your favourite tools

Sync, share and download your work on the systems below.

Figma

Sync your landing page with Figma and open the design as a Figma file.

Sketch

Send your designs to Sketch, open the design directly or download as Sketch file.

Adobe XD

Open your landing page with XD, sync the design directly or download as XD file.

Netlify

Convert your landing page design to HTML and host with Netlify with a click of a button.

Dropbox

Backup your Sigma files directly to your Dropbox account with a single action.

Gitlab

Automatically track commits, merges and pull requests with our activity feed.

More about our integrations

Explore our features

Tasks planner

Plan and schedule your weekly tasks on web or mobile through our desktop or mobile apps.

Team collaborations

Invite unlimited team members to view, edit, comment and create landing pages with you.

Version control

Full integration with Git, GitLab and Bitbucket to easily allow version control.

AB testing

Create unlimited AB tests for your landing pages and make the designs public or private.

One-click export

Export your completed landing pages to HTML in both Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS format.

Mobile application

Download our mobile app and continue to work on your landing pages through the mobile app.
